channel.title: Dragon Claws [Delta] - Fixed
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Well, I'm trying to add Dragon claws to my Delta source. I have the special working and everything. But when I go to my tab where you select what stance you want (defensive, aggressive etc). It says "Weapon !! NOT EXISTING ITEM !!" How do I make it so it says "Dragon Claws"? Thanks :)
Edit: How do I make it so you need 60 attack to use them also?
Edit: Fixed both of these.

item.title: Dragon Claws [Delta] - Fixed
item.dc:creator: @1pure1337 1pure1337
item.description:
@1pure1337 wrote:

You got to add it to items.cfg just find rune claws and copy paste below and change the name to dragon_claws then change the stats :), this will change the name to dragon claws…

Edit: saw your edit ill leave this post up just incase someone needs help with this.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws [Delta] - Fixed
